    • Constructor Detail

      • MultiServo

        public MultiServo(int... ports)
        Parameters:
        ports - The ports for the servos. Creates multiple servos that toggle within defined bounds together.

    • Method Detail

      • setServos

        public void setServos(double... angle)
        Parameters:
        angle - the angles to set for the servos

      • setBounds

        public void setBounds(double[][] bounds)
        Parameters:
        bounds - A 2D array of doubles to set the bounds of the servos Note: The first value is the on state

      • servoState

        public void servoState(boolean state)
        Parameters:
        state - Tells whether the servos should be the first or second values of the bounds.
